trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible alignments with which the items of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 与指定可能的对齐方式的项<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>可以显示。

trans-unit.source: You control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout by choosing one of the members of ToolStripLayoutStyle with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>通过选择与 ToolStripLayoutStyle 成员之一的布局<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Stack Layouts Stacking is the arranging of items beside each other at both ends of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈布局堆栈是排列并排<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>两端的项

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表介绍堆栈布局。

trans-unit.source: - StackWithOverflow is the default.
trans-unit.target: -默认值为 StackWithOverflow。

trans-unit.source: This setting causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to alter its layout automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property to handle dragging and docking scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 此设置会导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>改变其自动中根据所使用的布局<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>属性以处理拖动和停靠方案。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - VerticalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other vertically.
trans-unit.target: -VerticalStackWithOverflow 呈现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>垂直项并排。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - HorizontalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other horizontally.
trans-unit.target: -HorizontalStackWithOverflow 呈现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>水平项并排。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Features of Stack Layouts <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> determines the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to which the item is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 其他功能的堆栈布局<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>确定的末尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>到项对齐。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: 当项不适合在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢出按钮自动显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>属性设置确定是否项出现在溢出区域往常一样，根据需要或从不。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>事件中，你可以检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>属性来确定某项放在主<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，或如果当前根本未显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: 为什么不显示项的通常原因是该项未无法容纳在 main<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 请<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>可移动置于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>并将设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Layout Options The other layout options are Flow and Table.
trans-unit.target: 其他布局选项的其他布局选项为流和表。

trans-unit.source: Flow Layout Flow layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: 流布局流布局的默认设置是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 它是类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Flow layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 流布局的功能如下所示:-的所有功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>公开的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: 您必须将转换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>的类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the row.
trans-unit.target: -你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>以对齐行中的项的代码中的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>事件中，你可以检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>属性来确定某项放在主<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>还是无法容纳。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Flow layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: 不呈现-手柄，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>中的流布局样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>无法移动。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不呈现溢出按钮，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Table Layout Table layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 表布局表布局是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>的默认值

trans-unit.source: It is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 它是类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Table layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 表布局的功能如下所示:-的所有功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>公开的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: 您必须将转换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>的类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the table cell.
trans-unit.target: -你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>代码中用于对齐表单元格内的项的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>事件中，你可以检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>属性来确定某项放在主<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>还是无法容纳。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Table layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: 不呈现-手柄，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>中的表布局样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>无法移动。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不呈现溢出按钮，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 指定项流水平或垂直根据需要。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out horizontally and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 指定项水平方向进行布局和必要时会溢出。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out automatically.
trans-unit.target: 指定项自动布局。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out flush left.
trans-unit.target: 指定项的布局方式为左对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out vertically, are centered within the control, and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 指定项垂直方向进行布局、 在控件中，为中心和必要时会溢出。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
